SqlOutput.Sql: CASE WHEN (EXP(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0))) > 0 THEN FLOOR(EXP(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0))/POWER(10,-(CASE WHEN COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)>=0 THEN CEIL(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) ELSE FLOOR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) END)))*POWER(10,-(CASE WHEN COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)>=0 THEN CEIL(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) ELSE FLOOR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) END)) ELSE CEIL(EXP(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c, 0))*POWER(10,CASE WHEN COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)>=0 THEN CEIL(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) ELSE FLOOR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) END))/POWER(10,CASE WHEN COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)>=0 THEN CEIL(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) ELSE FLOOR(COALESCE($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c, 0)) END) END

CASE WHEN (EXP($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c)) > 0 THEN FLOOR(EXP($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c)/POWER(10,-(CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber2__c>=0 THEN CEIL($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c) ELSE FLOOR($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c) END)))*POWER(10,-(CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber2__c>=0 THEN CEIL($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c) ELSE FLOOR($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c) END)) ELSE CEIL(EXP($!s0s!$.customnumber1__c)*POWER(10,CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber2__c>=0 THEN CEIL($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c) ELSE FLOOR($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c) END))/POWER(10,CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber2__c>=0 THEN CEIL($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c) ELSE FLOOR($!s0s!$.customnumber2__c) END) END
